example.name: empty it
example.text: It is imperative that we stagger any medications that might interfere with levothyroxine absorption .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Now, with the vicar he was imperative that the matter of the reversion should be strictly confidential ? altogether 'sacred,' in fact.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Eradicating poverty is imperative of humankind
